description: Single storey rear extensions with single storey side extension to garage with hipped roof over and doors, rear dormer and rear outrigger dormer with front rooflights.
decision_conditions: The proposed dormer and front rooflights by reason of size, siting and design would appear bulky and incongruous, and would represent an overly dominant, incongruous and visually intrusive form of roof addition, out of keeping and character with, and detrimental to, the appearance and character of the property and Meadway Conservation Area, contrary to London Plan (2021) Policies D3, D4 and HC1, Core Strategy (2010) Policies CP30 and CP31, Development Management Document (2014) Policies DMD13, DMD37 and DMD44, National Planning Policy Framework (2024),  as well as having regards to the Meadway Conservation Area Character Appraisal.

The single storey rear extension by reason of its size, siting, excessive depth and height would have an overbearing effect upon the adjoining property No. 6 The Ridgeway, resulting in a loss of light and outlook detrimental to the amenities of that adjoining property contrary to London Plan (2021) Policies D3, Core Strategy (2010) Policies CP30, Development Management Document (2014) Polices DMD8, DMD11 and DMD37 and National Planning Policy Framework (2024).
